verses.text: Now the men of Israel had sworn in Mizpeh , saying , There shall not any of us give his daughter unto Benjamin to wife.
And the people came to the house of God , and abode there till even before God , and lifted up their voices , and wept sore ;
And said , O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* God of Israel , why is this come to pass in Israel , that there should be to day one tribe lacking in Israel ?
And it came to pass on the morrow , that the people rose early , and built there an altar , and offered burnt offerings and peace offerings.

And the children of Israel said , Who \add is there\add* among all the tribes of Israel that came not up with the congregation unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*? For they had made a great oath concerning him that came not up to the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* to Mizpeh , saying , He shall surely be put to death.
And the children of Israel repented them for Benjamin their brother , and said , There is one tribe cut off from Israel this day.
How shall we do for wives for them that remain , seeing we have sworn by the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* that we will not give them of our daughters to wives ? \p

¶ And they said , What one \add is there\add* of the tribes of Israel that came not up to Mizpeh to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*? And, behold, there came none to the camp from Jabesh-gilead to the assembly.
For the people were numbered , and, behold, \add there were\add* none of the inhabitants of Jabesh-gilead there.

And the congregation sent thither twelve thousand men of the valiantest , and commanded them, saying , Go and smite the inhabitants of Jabesh-gilead with the edge of the sword , with the women and the children.
And this \add is\add* the thing that ye shall do , Ye shall utterly destroy every male , and every woman that hath lain by man.\f + \fr 21.11 \ft hath lain…: Heb. knoweth the lying with man\f*

And they found among the inhabitants of Jabesh-gilead four hundred young virgins , that had known no man by lying with any male : and they brought them unto the camp to Shiloh , which \add is\add* in the land of Canaan.\f + \fr 21.12 \ft young…: Heb. young women virgins\f*

And the whole congregation sent \add some\add* to speak to the children of Benjamin that \add were\add* in the rock Rimmon , and to call peaceably unto them.\f + \fr 21.13 \ft to speak…: Heb. and spake and called\f*\f + \fr 21.13 \ft call…: or, proclaim peace\f*
And Benjamin came again at that time ; and they gave them wives which they had saved alive of the women of Jabesh-gilead : and yet so they sufficed them not.
And the people repented them for Benjamin , because that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had made a breach in the tribes of Israel. \p
¶ Then the elders of the congregation said , How shall we do for wives for them that remain , seeing the women are destroyed out of Benjamin ?
And they said , \add There must be\add* an inheritance for them that be escaped of Benjamin , that a tribe be not destroyed out of Israel.
Howbeit we may not give them wives of our daughters : for the children of Israel have sworn , saying , Cursed \add be\add* he that giveth a wife to Benjamin.

Then they said , Behold, \add there is\add* a feast of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in Shiloh yearly \add in a place\add* which \add is\add* on the north side of Beth-el , on the east side of the highway that goeth up from Beth-el to Shechem , and on the south of Lebonah.\f + \fr 21.19 \ft yearly: Heb. from year to year\f*\f + \fr 21.19 \ft on the east…: or, toward the sunrising\f*\f + \fr 21.19 \ft of the highway: or, on the highway\f*
Therefore they commanded the children of Benjamin , saying , Go and lie in wait in the vineyards ;

And see , and, behold, if the daughters of Shiloh come out to dance in dances , then come ye out of the vineyards , and catch you every man his wife of the daughters of Shiloh , and go to the land of Benjamin.

And it shall be, when their fathers or their brethren come unto us to complain , that we will say unto them, Be favourable unto them for our sakes: because we reserved not to each man his wife in the war : for ye did not give unto them at this time , \add that\add* ye should be guilty.\f + \fr 21.22 \ft Be favourable…: or, Gratify us in them\f*

And the children of Benjamin did so , and took \add them\add* wives , according to their number , of them that danced , whom they caught : and they went and returned unto their inheritance , and repaired the cities , and dwelt in them.
And the children of Israel departed thence at that time , every man to his tribe and to his family , and they went out from thence every man to his inheritance.
In those days \add there was\add* no king in Israel : every man did \add that which was\add* right in his own eyes.
